helpful: 1 of 1 people (100%) found this review helpful
review: All I can say is that this game is fun. The concept of Counter Terrorist vs. Terrorist makes excellent intense gameplay. The CS community is smaller than other games, although it has a nice appeal that you can remember a few players who you've played with a while back, knowing whos 'hot' and whos 'not'.
Great zombie killing game! Multiple game modes with a the campaign that is more fun with friends.... if you have some ;)
You can do whatever you like in this open world... Need I say more?

2K14 is the best basketball simulator that is out at the moment. Ever since i've been dragged into the 2K series, it seems to just increase in its game quality. All the movements are life-like and most of the players have their own styles. MyPlayer game mode will make you hooked to the game, and with the soundtrack with songs you know and love, making it even more addicting. This game is one of the best sports simulators out!

If you're into FPS games that aren't as intense as CS or COD and want a little fun, this game is definitetly for you. Challenging your friends while playing together is also a way to make this game even more fun.
Good game! Especially if you play it with friends!
